message:
Thanks for the review!

I am actually planning an update, mostly just to support netstandard, which is right around the corner now. I'm also taking the opportunity to do a few small things like adding caching for the property change notifications. The "new" version is here: [https://github.com/StephenCleary/Mvvm.CalculatedProperties](https://github.com/StephenCleary/Mvvm.CalculatedProperties)
